snippet: The Republican candidate for governor says New York is lagging, compared with other states, on issues like taxes and economic opportunity.
abstract: Ad Campaign column takes a look at latest television ad coming from election campaign of Westchester County Executive Rob Astorino, Republican trying to unseat New York Gov Andrew M Cuomo.
lead_paragraph: The Republican candidate for governor says New York is lagging, compared with other states, on issues like taxes and economic opportunity.

headline.main: In New Commercial, Astorino Laments the State of the State
headline.print_headline: In New Commercial, Astorino Laments the State of the State
